zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[现阶段略微下行趋势]
zh.content:
当前以太坊（ETH/USD）价格为2904.76美元，24小时内下跌0.77%。从高点2933.73美元下滑至低点2898.74美元，显示出市场短期内的卖压。整体来看，当前价格在2900美元附近徘徊，可能表明市场处于调整阶段，但若能守住关键支撑位，仍有反弹的可能。

技术指标方面，虽然RSI（14）数据缺失，但从MACD来看，9.054348的值表明当前动能仍然偏强，短期内没有明显的卖出信号。SMA(20)位于2927.53美元，作为短期趋势的参考，若价格持续低于此水平，可能会加大进一步下行的风险。

支撑位方面，2898.74美元是关键的短期支撑，若跌破可能会引发更大幅度的回调。相对而言，上方阻力位在2933美元附近，突破此位有望恢复上行趋势。建议交易者在确认趋势后，可以考虑在2900美元附近逐步布局多单，若价格反弹至2930美元以上则可逐步止盈。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum has recently experienced a slight downward trend with its current price at 2904.76, reflecting a 24-hour change of -0.77%. The price has tested the support level at 2898.74, which could act as a critical buffer against further declines. If this level is broken, we may see a deeper retracement towards 2850, while a bounce from here could indicate a potential upward movement back toward the recent high of 2933.73.

The current SMA(20) at 2927.53 suggests that the short-term trend remains slightly bearish, as the price is currently below this moving average. Moreover, the MACD reading of 9.054348 indicates bullish momentum but is not confirmed by a strong signal line, suggesting caution. Traders should monitor these indicators closely; a crossover of the MACD above the signal line could provide a bullish entry point.

Support can be identified at the 2898.74 level, while resistance is likely at the 2933.73 mark. A confirmed break above this resistance could signal a return to a bullish trend, potentially targeting 2950. Traders might consider setting buy orders around 2900 to capitalize on a possible bounce, while stop-loss orders could be strategically placed under the support level to mitigate risk.

In summary, Ethereum's current position presents both challenges and opportunities. With the price hovering near critical support, traders should remain vigilant and consider technical indicators for further confirmation. A cautious approach with well-placed orders could enable participation in potential price recovery while managing risk effectively.
